entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
